Hi. I’m an engineer, specialized in web & mobile software, with some experience in hardware, hard sciences and mathematics. A graduate of IIT Kharagpur and IIM Lucknow, I have worked with tech startups in roles as diverse as engineering, sales and product management.

Based in Udaipur (India), I’m currently working independently and available for hire. You can see some of my work here or GitHub and contact me.

I also like to make music, read, write and travel.
